txt.en: Heal-over-Time added to Beacon of Hope
Heals from Flanks are now Area-of-Effect
Lesser Memory of the West\n(Max Level: 74)
Improved Staff Strike doesn't consume Flanked effect
Improved Staff Strike doesn't consume Flanked effect
Beacon of Hope has a chance to add Water-Lore's Heal over Time effect to your target. In-combat only.
